projects.title: Student Competition Robot Design
projects.description: To design a modular, durable, and easy-to-assemble robot prototype for a Japanese robotics teacher. The model serves as a training tool and testing platform for student competitions and classroom demonstrations.
projects.objective: To design a modular, durable, and easy-to-assemble robot prototype for a Japanese robotics teacher. The model serves as a training tool and testing platform for student competitions and classroom demonstrations.
projects.engineeringInsight:
This project demonstrates Enginaro's commitment to education-focused engineering. The robot is now used
 by a Japanese robotics teacher to challenge and educate students through modular, hands-on design
 thinking.
scopeOfWork: Mechanical design and layout using SolidWorks
Chassis design for obstacle navigation and load-bearing
Track system and motor placement optimization
Provision for modular arm or tool attachment
Exporting CAD models for student access and test assembly
challenges: Designing for modularity to allow tool changes
Ensuring stability and durability during student handling
Optimizing gear ratios and chain drive placement
deliverables: Fully modeled robot chassis and drive system
SolidWorks source files for reuse in classroom settings
Documentation for student assembly and part functions
Images and animated walkthrough for virtual classroom use

projects.title: CLoth Packing Machine
projects.description: Design a high-throughput automated system for folded clothing units using a conveyor lift, alignment guides, and collection bins.
projects.objective: Develop a custom precision measurement tool for aerospace components that ensures accuracy to within 0.001mm for critical aircraft parts inspection.
projects.engineeringInsight: Achieving sub-micron precision required careful consideration of thermal expansion, material selection, and measurement methodology. We implemented advanced calibration algorithms and temperature compensation systems, while designing the tool geometry to minimize deflection under measurement loads. The solution demonstrates how precision engineering principles can be applied to create tools that exceed industry standards.
scopeOfWork: Precision engineering design using CAD software
challenges: Ensuring tool durability under repeated use

projects.title: IoT Monitoring System
projects.description: An IoT-based monitoring system for industrial equipment that provides real-time data and predictive maintenance alerts.
projects.objective: Design and implement an IoT-based monitoring system for industrial equipment that provides real-time data analytics and predictive maintenance capabilities.
projects.engineeringInsight: The engineering complexity lay in creating a robust system that could operate reliably in harsh industrial environments while processing vast amounts of sensor data in real-time. We developed edge computing algorithms to reduce latency and implemented machine learning models that adapt to equipment behavior patterns. The distributed architecture ensures system resilience and scalability across diverse manufacturing environments.
challenges: Ensuring reliable data transmission in industrial environments
Maintaining system security and data privacy
